languages.text: "Хотя ваша привилегия и позволяет вам держать подле себя несанкционированного {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}, не каждый Вольный Торговец поставил бы его подле себя в такой день. Вольнодумцы и любители нарушать правила оценят вашу смелость".

traits.locale_text: "Хотя ваша привилегия и позволяет вам держать подле себя несанкционированного псайкера, не каждый Вольный Торговец поставил бы его подле себя в такой день. Вольнодумцы и любители нарушать правила оценят вашу смелость".

languages.text: "Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."
languages.original_text: "Хотя ваша привилегия и позволяет вам держать подле себя несанкционированного {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}, не каждый Вольный Торговец поставил бы его подле себя в такой день. Вольнодумцы и любители нарушать правила оценят вашу смелость".

traits.locale_text: "Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned psyker in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

"Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned psyker in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

"Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

"Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

"Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

languages.text: 「未認可の{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}を随行する特権があっても、すべての自由開拓者がこのような晴れの日に認可なき者を隣に置くわけではありません。自由な考えとルールを越える姿は陛下の勇気を示すでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

traits.locale_text: 「未認可の{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}を随行する特権があっても、すべての自由開拓者がこのような晴れの日に認可なき者を隣に置くわけではありません。自由な考えとルールを越える姿は陛下の勇気を示すでしょう」

languages.text: “尽管您的特权允许您将未获授权的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}纳入随行人员之中，但并非每位行商浪人都有这样的胆识，会在这样重大的场合与灵能者一同亮相。那群放浪不羁的自由主义者与反传统分子将会为您的勇气折服。”
languages.original_text: "Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

traits.locale_text: “尽管您的特权允许您将未获授权的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}纳入随行人员之中，但并非每位行商浪人都有这样的胆识，会在这样重大的场合与灵能者一同亮相。那群放浪不羁的自由主义者与反传统分子将会为您的勇气折服。”

languages.text: «Aunque sus privilegios le permiten tener a una {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} no autorizada en su séquito, son pocos los Comerciantes Independientes que tendrían a una a su lado para semejante ocasión. A los librepensadores y a quienes desprecian a los gobernantes les impresionará su valor».
languages.original_text: "Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque sus privilegios le permiten tener a una {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} no autorizada en su séquito, son pocos los Comerciantes Independientes que tendrían a una a su lado para semejante ocasión. A los librepensadores y a quienes desprecian a los gobernantes les impresionará su valor».

languages.text: « Même si vos privilèges vous permettent d'avoir une {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} non assermentée dans votre entourage, peu de libres-marchands se risqueraient à l'exposer aux yeux de tous en un jour pareil. Ceux qui méprisent les règles ne pourront qu'être impressionnés par votre courage. »
languages.original_text: "Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

traits.locale_text: « Même si vos privilèges vous permettent d'avoir une {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} non assermentée dans votre entourage, peu de libres-marchands se risqueraient à l'exposer aux yeux de tous en un jour pareil. Ceux qui méprisent les règles ne pourront qu'être impressionnés par votre courage. »

languages.text: "Eure Privilegien erlauben zwar eine unsanktionierte {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g} in Eurem Gefolge, aber nicht alle Freihändler würden eine an diesem Tag an ihre Seite stellen. Freidenker und Autoritätsgegner werden allerdings von Eurem Mut beeindruckt sein."
languages.original_text: "Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Privilegien erlauben zwar eine unsanktionierte {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g} in Eurem Gefolge, aber nicht alle Freihändler würden eine an diesem Tag an ihre Seite stellen. Freidenker und Autoritätsgegner werden allerdings von Eurem Mut beeindruckt sein."

languages.text: "İmtiyazlarınız, onaysız bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezeri{/g} maiyetinize katmanıza izin verse de normal bir Hür Tacir, böyle bir günde kendisini yanında bulundurmazdı. Hür düşünen, kuralları küçümseyenler; cesaretinizden etkilenecektir."
languages.original_text: "Even though your privileges allow you to keep an unsanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in your retinue, not every Rogue Trader would have one at their side on such a day. The freethinkers and the scorners of rules will be impressed by your courage."

traits.locale_text: "İmtiyazlarınız onaysız bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}i maiyetinize katmanıza izin verse de sıradan bir Hür Tacir böyle bir günde kendisini yanında bulundurmazdı. Hür düşünceye sahip ve kuralları küçümseyen kişiler cesaretinizden etkilenecektir."
